Class FacebookButtonBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.TextView

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnPreDrawListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LikeButton, LoginButton, ShareButtonBase

    public abstract class FacebookButtonBase
extends android.widget.Button
    A base class for a facebook button.

    • Method Detail

      • setFragment

        public void setFragment(android.support.v4.app.Fragment fragment)
        Sets the fragment that contains this control. This allows the button to be embedded inside a Fragment, and will allow the fragment to receive the onActivityResult call rather than the Activity.
        Parameters:
        fragment - the fragment that contains this control

      • getFragment

        public android.support.v4.app.Fragment getFragment()

        The fragment that contains this control.

      • setRequestCode

        protected void setRequestCode(int requestCode)
        Set the request code for the startActivityForResult call. The requestCode should be outside of the range of those reserved for the Facebook SDK FacebookSdk.isFacebookRequestCode(int). This method should also be called prior to registering any callbacks.
        Parameters:
        requestCode - the request code to use.

      • getRequestCode

        public int getRequestCode()
        Returns the request code used for this Button.
        Returns:
        the request code.
